title: Chromatic Cloak
summaries: The Chromatic Cloak is a Hardmode accessory which allows a more controlled Shimmering. When equipped, touching Shimmer does not immediately inflict the Shimmering debuff, and the player can instead start Shimmering at any time by holding the â–¼ Down key. However, after Shimmering starts, it cannot be interrupted anymore, not even by re-equipping the Chromatic Cloak.
